creator: juergen-a.vogel@db.com
text:
hi,
we want to define tables with borders arround each cell.
the tables are larger than 1 page.
when we use border-top-style or border-bottom-style like above, the 
available page-size reduces itself dramatically. there are page breaks in the 
middle of the page. if we leave the borders, its ok. so i think that there are 
errors in calculating
the space the borders need.
  
<fo:table-row>
     <fo:table-cell border-top-style="solid" border-width="0.5pt">
          <fo:block>
               <xsl:value-of select="$object_type"/>
           </fo:block>
      </fo:table-cell>
      <fo:table-cell border-top-style="solid" border-width="0.5pt">
           <fo:block>
                <xsl:value-of select="$object_name"/>
           </fo:block>
      </fo:table-cell>
</fo:table-row>
